description:
Kashima Miyuki is one of the two main female characters in the series. Is the object of affection of Wakamatsu Masato. She likes him too, but is rather shy about it, and often gets into misunderstandings with him. A gentle, refined girl. Daughter of Kashima Yasujirou, but doesn`t know about his activities.
Source: AdachiFan
name: Kashima Miyuki
